title: HOPE Assessment CRUD Controller
description:
Implement HOPE Assessment Management Controller with CMS Compliance Validation

Create a backend controller to handle HOPE (Home Health Outcome and Patient Evaluation) assessment operations with full CMS regulatory compliance checking.

Requirements:
- Create RESTful endpoints for HOPE assessment CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
- Implement CMS compliance validation rules for HOPE assessment data
- Validate required fields and data formats according to CMS specifications
- Enforce assessment timing rules (admission, resumption of care, recertification, discharge, transfer)
- Implement validation for OASIS-E data items included in HOPE assessments
- Handle assessment locking logic (prevent edits after submission deadlines)
- Ensure proper error handling with CMS-specific validation messages
- Add authorization checks to ensure only qualified clinicians can complete assessments
- Log all assessment state changes for audit trail requirements
- Include unit tests covering validation scenarios and edge cases
- Document CMS regulation references for each validation rule

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Duplicate assessment submissions for same patient/time period
- Assessment modifications after submission window closes
- Missing or incomplete OASIS item responses
- Invalid assessment reason codes or timing combinations
- Role-based access for different assessment types (RN vs PT vs OT)

Dependencies:
- CMS OASIS-E data specifications (latest version)
- Existing patient data model
- Authentication/authorization service
- Audit logging infrastructure
